title: Favorite Mittens.....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Oh, Maki-chan, your mittens look warm~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Honoka won this from a UFO catcher and forced me to take them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>How nice of her. Are they now your favorite mittens?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, not exactly...... But they are warm. My hands aren’t cold at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmmm.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Why are you looking at me like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s nothing! Now I also want to play on some UFO catcher machines. Let’s go together, Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’m going to get you a scarf to match those gloves!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>But why!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
